summary: Every year , we report on the Export-Import Bank, which helps finance U.S. companies' exports. The Bank may not finance defense goods and services, but it can finance exports that have both civilian and military uses (dual use). The Bank monitors the use of these exports to ensure that they are used mostly for civilian purposes. This year, the Bank determined that dual-use exports were...
title: Export-Import Bank: Status of End-Use Monitoring of Dual-Use Exports as of August 2017
